MFNKMatrix Class Reference
[MFNKMatrix]

An n by k matrix, mainly used to store a basis for the tangent space of a k-dimensional manifold embedded in an n- dimensional space. More...

#include <MFNKMatrix.h>

Detailed Description

An n by k matrix, mainly used to store a basis for the tangent space of a k-dimensional manifold embedded in an n- dimensional space.

There are several types of MFNKMatrices. The user should use the Matrix factory routine in an implicitly defined manifold so that the correct type for that manifold is used.
